Forms

Small Form

A small form is centered on tablet and desktop. On mobile it goes full width.

Some clue

Medium Form

A large form is also centered and offers more space at the tablet and desktop sizes, but adapts to smaller screens.

Large Form

A large form is bigger on desktop size, but on tablet it becomes a medium form.

Adapting Form Example

At heart, I am large form, but on desktop there are 2 rows and on tablet there are 4 rows.
